org.osgeo.mapguide

Class MgGeometricEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject
      • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgDisposable
        • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGuardDisposable
          • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgSerializable
            • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGeometricEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MgGeometry, MgGeometryComponent

    public class MgGeometricEntity
extends MgSerializable
    MgGeometricEntity is an abstract base class that is the root of all geometry and geometry component classes.

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        Overrides:
        finalize in class MgSerializable

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Overrides:
        delete in class MgSerializable

      • getDimension

        public int getDimension()
        Gets the geometric dimension of this entity, indicating whether the entity is defined by points, curves, or regions, that is, is zero, one, or two dimensional.
        Returns:
        Returns one of the values defined in MgGeometricDimension.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Tests whether this entity is empty or not.
        Returns:
        True if the geometry is empty, false otherwise.

      • isSimple

        public boolean isSimple()
        Tests whether this entity is simple or not. Simple entities do not contain any points of self-tangency or self intersection.
        Returns:
        True if the geometry is simple, false otherwise.

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Tests whether the entity's boundary encloses an area.
        Returns:
        True if the geometry is closed, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Tests whether the coordinates given to construct the entity represent a valid Geometry or GeometryComponent. Note: Optional for MapGuide.
        Returns:
        True if the geometry is valid, false otherwise.

      • envelope

        public MgEnvelope envelope()
        Gets this geometric entity's bounding box.
        Returns:
        Returns an MgEnvelope object representing the bounding box.

      • copy

        public MgGeometricEntity copy()
        Returns a copy of this geometric entity.
        Returns:
        An MgGeometricEntity that is a copy of this one.

      • transform

        public MgGeometricEntity transform(MgTransform transform)
        Returns a transformed copy of this geometric entity.
        Parameters:
        transform - (MgTransform) The MgTransform to use in constructing a copy of this geometric entity.
        Returns:
        An MgGeometricEntity that is a copy of this one with each coordinate transformed.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns the area for this geometric entity or zero for MgLineString and MgPoint objects. Calculates the area for each MgPolygon in an MgMultiPolygon or for each MgCurvePolygon in an MgMultiCurvePolygon and returns the sum of areas.
        Returns:
        The area of this geometric entity.

      • getLength

        public double getLength()
        Calculates and returns the length for this geometric entity. Defaults to zero for MgPoint objects.
        Returns:
        Length of this geometric entity

      • getCentroid

        public MgPoint getCentroid()
        Calculates and returns the centroid of this geometric entity.
        Returns:
        A centroid point
